channel.title: Draynor - A Replication of Runescape Protocols
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://draynor.org/home/imgs/logo.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Welcome to the Official Draynor Advertisement thread. Draynor used to be the name of a 317 server, but is now under 718 development. With out further ado I present you Draynor, a RuneScape Emulation.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Draynor will be a complete Runescape-Remake right before Runescape released EOC. We strive for perfection, and do not accept anything but excellence on our part. The developers will be going in overtime to make this the best Runescape-Remake it can possibly be. This is Draynor, A Replication of Runescape Protocols .[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3] [U]Draynor Developers[/U] Torv James[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vhevoOQ.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Images] [CENTER]Login:[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AkOduMw.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Lobby:[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wWgvkk6.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Style Selection:[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tsyF8P6.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Full Grand Exchange: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6G3vtun.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Buy/Sell History: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9hqAYbf.png[/img][/CENTER]

[CENTER]Kree'arra: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CGRRpa6.png[/img][/CENTER]

[CENTER]K'ril Tsutsaroth: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6peP8fZ.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Glacors: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hvdiOQZ.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[CENTER]Musicians: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lKhPGLR.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Draynor - A Replication of Runescape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Yes lawsuit, it’s copyright infringement. Its still against the law using the protocol, but at least they wont prosecute him as bad.

Read full topic
item.source: Draynor - A Replication of Runescape Protocols

item.title: Draynor - A Replication of Runescape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:3, topic:543893”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=662775.msg4429570#msg4429570 date=1402591721]
Barley a replica, you couldn’t even get the client background the same
[/quote]

I’m pretty sure he’s talking about purely content. Why would he want to keep the name as RuneScape, and have the same images and face a potential lawsuit? At least he’s doing something creative.[/quote]
You stupid fk, lawsuit haha

Changing the clients bg is creative rofl

Read full topic
item.source: Draynor - A Replication of Runescape Protocols

Barley a replica, you couldn’t even get the client background the same

I’m pretty sure he’s talking about purely content. Why would he want to keep the name as RuneScape, and have the same images and face a potential lawsuit? At least he’s doing something creative.
